description.displayText: I hired Rosa couple months ago when I was desperate and struggling trying to find a good house Keeping (IN MIAMI WHICH IS REALLY HARD) to come every week to my apartment. I've had a many others but none of them did what Rosa does every time she come to my place. She DEEP CLEAN my whole house. Every time I get home after she cleans I get that fresh house smell that I love. She is very caring and helpful with anything I ask her to. Always giving me advice on how to take care of things when I'm by myself and trying to help you find a solution for anything you talk to her even with my personal stuff. I'm really grateful to have her helping me and I highly recommend her. Thank you Rosa

description.displayText: She was good for the first three weeks, but was always late. She didn't want to do laundry which was part of the job, which I was fine with. The last time she came, she got into an argument with my valet which got her very upset. She told me she was going to find parking elsewhere and hung up on me. I never saw her again. This was the day before thanksgiving - so I was left with a dirty house when I was supposed to be prepping and cooking. The week before that she called me 30 min after she was supposed to show up and told me she couldn't make it. I would not hire Rosa as she is not dependable.

description.displayText: I have hired Rosa to help me with my rental property. I am running it remotely and have found Rosa to be so much more an asset than I assumed I needed.  In the few weeks we have worked together she has gone over and beyond for me.  Willing to work longer hours to help with broken locks, meeting technicians and service people, sending packages for me, etc.  And she does an excellent job cleaning the property.  She juggles a constant changing schedule and has been punctual and trustworthy.  Thank you Rosa.  I look forward to our continued work relationship.

description.displayText: Rosa is great. I highly recommend hiring her for your next clean or pet care. She loves pets and is so friendly and easy to talk to. Which is a plus. She cleans my place so well and leaves it in Pristine condition. So happy I found Rosa on this site because I was so hesitant. She's very honest and nice

description.displayText: We are so grateful to have found Rosa. She is punctual, easy to reach, and does an excellent job cleaning our home. We have her clean once every few weeks and it's such a relief to come back to a clean home. We highly recommend her! Thank you, Rosa! :)
description.originalText: We are so grateful to have found Rosa. She is punctual, easy to reach, and does an excellent job cleaning our home. We have her clean once every few weeks and it's such a relief to come back to a clean home. We highly recommend her! Thank you, Rosa! :)

description.displayText: Rosa is excellent. She is dependable, high-energy, extremely organized and a hard worker.  I couldn't recommend her more highly. She has worked with me for over two months, twice a week.  My place is always sparkling when she is finished.  I'm so happy to have found her.
description.originalText: Rosa is excellent. She is dependable, high-energy, extremely organized and a hard worker.  I couldn't recommend her more highly. She has worked with me for over two months, twice a week.  My place is always sparkling when she is finished.  I'm so happy to have found her.

description.displayText:
I have a large lab mix named Kylo. I work long hours, and it has been such a relief having Rosa stop by to walk him once a day during the week. Kylo is young and very high-energy, so he misbehaves when he doesn't get enough exercise. He is also a rescue dog and is sometimes unsure or protective meeting new people. Rosa was very patient with him as he got to know her. Since she has been walking with him, he is well-behaved and well-exercised every day, and he loves her! When my husband and I went away for a week, Rosa stopped by to walk him, feed him, and spend time with him a few times a day. It was a huge weight off my shoulders knowing that Kylo would be cared for by someone he knew in an environment that he was accustomed to.

In addition to walking the dog, Rosa also cleans the apartment for us once every other week. She does a thorough job, and it is so convenient.

Thank you so much, Rosa.  You have been a wonderful addition to our daily life!!

description.displayText: Rosa is a very good cleaner and she was cleaning my house on a regular basis. The last time we scheduled a cleaning she didn't show up, didn't respond any of my messages just disappeared. I am actually quite worried if everything is ok with her. If anybody has any info please let me know. Thanks

description.displayText:
Rosa has worked with me for nearly two years. She has cleaned my personal home as well as investment properties which I have used for short-term rental.  She has been an excellent employee and I recommend her without reservation. Before I hired Rosa I knew I needed three attributes from a housekeeper: (1) Capable of doing great work, (2) Positive attitude and commitment to excel, (3) On time, consistently available and also trustworthy. Rosa has surpassed these without fail. 

She not only cleans but also manages the entire process -- grocery shopping, replenishing consumables, anticipating when maintenance may soon be necessary or when minor things would help spruce up the property, checking guests in/out, assessing any damage and of course cleaning and preparing a property of any number of guests. The reality is she's more than just a housekeeper. Hiring Rosa means getting a personal assistant,  a housekeeper and, most important, a trusted friend.
